input.sentences: at a costume run | the photographer comes across an attractive woman .
after talking to her | he runs into a man with a green wig .
then | he thinks he sees santa .
he then comes across some shirtless guys .
at the end | someone in a wolf costume says hi to him .
output.sentences: This woman was part of the town's Halloween run and a photographer snapped her picture for our town's paper.
This guy always wears a wig when he runs the race and talks a mile a minute when he's not racing.
There are always a few guys that show up shirtless, thinking they look hot and not just silly.
One runner dressed as a Western-themed Santa.
Another guy managed to run in a wolf costume, although I bet he was super hot in it.
